system.weapons:
3 Hardpoints for Weapons and/or Support Systems

Recommended Loadout: Heavy Burst Ion Cannon/Ion Accelerator, Twin-Linked Smart Missile System/Twin-Linked Plasma Rifle/Twin-Linked Fusion Blaster, Shield Generator.
system.specialRules: Battle Suit Strength: 80. Primary Systems: Blacksun Filter, Enhanced Motive Systems, Environmental Seal, Jet Pack, Multi-Tracker. Special: Equipped with Nova Reactor, Once per Round as Half Action or Reaction, can make -10 Tech-Use Test, if fail suffer 1 damage ignoring armour and Toughness +1 per DoF. If success until next turn do one of: Gain Prot 10 Forcefield +10 per DoS (max 95) that doesn't overload, One weapon gains Storm Quality, One Weapon gains Overcharge (5) or increases Overcharge by 5, Increase Flyer Trait by 1, +1 per DoS.
